text: is a metro station on the Osaka Metro Tanimachi Line in Abeno-ku, Osaka, Japan. Trains starting from Fuminosato bound for Miyakojima and Dainichi also run. While situated relatively close to Showacho on the Midosuji Line, there is no free transfer between the two stations. ==Layout== This station has an island platform serving two tracks on the second basement. ==Establishments around the station== *Fuminosato Shopping Arcade *Okazakiya *Momogaike Park ==Stations next to Fuminosato== Category:Railway stations in Osaka Prefecture Category:Railway stations in Japan opened in 1980 Category:Osaka Metro stations
title: Fuminosato Station
